project_title: Peerspace Rebrand & Social Growth
overview: Co-led the complete rebrand of Peerspace and developed the go-to-market strategy to launch the new identity. Oversaw ongoing social strategy and content production, resulting in a 56% growth in their social presence within 8 months. The work focused on building a strong visual and narrative framework that connected with their audience across platforms.
contribution: Co-authored and directed the brand refresh strategy
Led creative and content strategy for social channels
Oversaw cross-platform execution, blending hero campaigns with ongoing content streams
deliverables: Hero brand films and launch video assets
Social-first content, including TikTok trends, Instagram reels, and LinkedIn campaigns
Static and motion-based content for recurring social programs
impact: Achieved a 56% increase in organic social presence within 8 months
Strengthened brand perception through cohesive visual storytelling and video-driven campaigns
Elevated Peerspace's brand recognition in key markets

project_title: Community.com Paid & Organic Growth
overview: Following Community.com's Series A raise, we were brought on as their outsourced creative team to build and execute a full-stack paid and organic content strategy. Over an 18-month retainer, we led go-to-market strategy on a monthly cadence while managing pre-production for video shoots, post-production with animation, and delivering a constant flow of static and video assets for TikTok, LinkedIn, and Instagram.
contribution: Developed and executed a comprehensive paid and organic content strategy
Directed pre-production and video shoots, ensuring seamless creative coordination
Oversaw post-production and animation to create polished, high-performing content
deliverables: Static and video content designed for TikTok, LinkedIn, and Instagram
Monthly go-to-market strategy decks and campaign concepts
A full suite of creative assets for both paid campaigns and organic social
impact: Amplified brand visibility and user engagement across all key social platforms
Supported Community.com's post-Series A growth through cohesive storytelling and performance-driven creative
Streamlined production by acting as an end-to-end outsourced creative team

project_title: Betr Product Design & Performance Marketing
overview: At Betr, I worked across both product design and marketing creative, ensuring a seamless connection between the in-app experience, go-to-market campaigns, and paid social performance. My role focused on optimizing user flows, onboarding, and wallet features while leading the creation of high-performing paid and organic content. This dual approach not only strengthened brand and product alignment but also contributed directly to user acquisition and retention ahead of key funding milestones.
contribution: Led product design improvements across onboarding, wallet flow, and in-app user experience
Directed creative for paid marketing and organic social campaigns, including TikTok, Instagram, and Twitter
Collaborated with leadership on go-to-market strategy and investor-facing creative tied to fundraising
deliverables: Product design systems for mobile and web
High-performing paid ad campaigns and creative assets
Organic content and motion design for social growth and user engagement
Go-to-market materials that supported fundraising milestones and Series A positioning
impact: Improved first-bet conversion and day-one retention through product flow optimization
Strengthened brand visibility and acquisition with data-driven paid creative
Supported funding efforts with strategic creative and product design alignment

project_title: Eterna Brand & Custom Shopify Build
overview: We led Eterna's brand from concept to delivery, creating a complete visual identity and e‑commerce experience. Our work included designing all brand packaging, diecuts, and physical product presentation, as well as developing a custom Shopify storefront with both front-end UI and backend functionality. The goal was to build a premium DTC platform that felt refined, trustworthy, and conversion-driven.
contribution: Developed the full brand identity and packaging system, including diecuts and product design
Designed and built a custom Shopify front-end and integrated backend systems (subscriptions, product variants, CMS)
Directed art, UX, and photography to ensure cohesive storytelling across digital and physical touchpoints
deliverables: Brand guidelines, packaging, and printed collateral
Custom Shopify site: homepage, product pages, subscription flows, and backend integrations
UX wireframes, high-fidelity UI design, and mobile-first site optimization
Art direction and content styling for on-site imagery and visuals
impact: Delivered a fully realized brand from packaging to digital experience
Built a premium e‑commerce platform that increased trust and improved conversion paths
Streamlined subscription workflows and backend management for scalability

project_title: Dorado Crypto‑Native IRA Platform UX & Brand
overview: We helped Dorado, a Miami‑based startup building the U.S.'s first crypto-native IRA platform, by leading front‑end UX architecture, wireframing, and brand development. Our goal was to design with clarity and confidence—so users could navigate the complex world of crypto investments within an IRA setting.
contribution: Crafted UX wireframes and full screen flows for onboarding, trading, staking, and retirement setup
Designed front‑end architecture to balance usability and backend needs
Developed brand identity, visual system, typography, and UI style for consistency
deliverables: Full screen wireframes for web platform
High-fidelity UI designs and interaction specs
Brand assets: logo, color palette, typography, iconography, UI components
Front‑end-ready design files aligned with engineering frameworks
impact: Established a clear, trust-focused user journey for complex IRA functionality
Created a cohesive, branded experience that balanced fintech credibility with crypto growth
Enabled smoother handoff to engineers with structured deliverables and modular components

project_title: Deuna • Branded Hero Animation
overview: We created the branded hero video for Deuna's go-to-market product launch, focusing on animation and motion storytelling to drive attention and awareness. Following their brand guidelines, we designed a narrative that highlighted the speed and simplicity of their one-click checkout system, helping to generate significant early traction and visibility for the product.
contribution: Concepted and storyboarded the hero video for the product launch
Designed and animated the video, aligning with Deuna's brand voice and guidelines
Collaborated with Deuna's internal team to ensure message clarity and visual consistency
deliverables: Hero product launch animation (20–30 sec)
Social adaptations for platforms including Instagram, LinkedIn, and TikTok
impact: Helped drive brand awareness and attention during launch
Positioned Deuna as a modern, trusted fintech brand in the LatAm market
Delivered a cohesive visual narrative for both web and social channels

project_title: Dutchie – Hero Launch Video
overview: We collaborated with Dutchie to produce a hero video that captured the brand's essence and supported its market presence in the cannabis tech space. The project focused on crafting a sleek, modern narrative to highlight Dutchie's innovative approach and its seamless platform experience.
contribution: Led concept development and visual storytelling for the hero video
Directed animation and motion graphics to align with Dutchie's established brand guidelines
Oversaw post-production to ensure a polished, high-impact final asset
deliverables: A hero video designed for multi-platform use (social and web)
Custom motion graphics and animations
A visual narrative highlighting the brand's core value propositions
impact: Elevated Dutchie's digital presence with a high-quality visual centerpiece
Created content that supported product awareness and engagement during key campaigns

project_title: Amway • Motion Campaign Videos
overview: We produced a series of motion videos for Amway, focusing on several of their product lines. The work involved creating dynamic animation-driven storytelling that highlighted product benefits and features, all while staying consistent with Amway's global brand guidelines. These assets were designed for use across social media, internal marketing, and digital campaigns.
contribution: Concepted and storyboarded motion video campaigns for multiple product lines
Designed and animated all video elements, including transitions, product highlights, and branded visuals
Ensured all creative assets aligned with Amway's global style and tone
deliverables: A suite of animated videos for social and digital campaigns
Cutdowns and optimized variations for platforms like Instagram, TikTok, and LinkedIn
Visual templates for scaling future motion campaigns
impact: Elevated the digital presence of Amway's product lines through clean, engaging animation
Supported brand consistency across global markets with cohesive motion design
Increased content flexibility with reusable motion templates and variations

project_title: Ethereum Merge • ConsenSys NFT Launch & Animation
overview: To commemorate the Ethereum Merge, ConsenSys led what became one of the largest NFT drops in history—the Regenesis collection—and I was part of the go‑to‑market team handling strategy, design, and animation. Our work was featured in The Wall Street Journal and recognized by MUSE Creative Awards. We also created a one‑of‑one NFT that minted on the first block of the new proof‑of‑stake chain.
contribution: Developed NFT design strategy and marketing campaign plan
Created and animated NFTs across open and limited editions—including the unique first‑block mint
Coordinated launch logistics and execution across platforms and formats
deliverables: Animated NFT assets for Regenesis collection
Open edition + limited edition + one-of-one animations
Campaign materials including motion teasers and social clips
impact: Delivered one of the largest NFT drops ever with mass global visibility
Secured mainstream media recognition (Wall Street Journal, Decrypt) for the campaign
Produced the first sustainable, proof-of-stake minted NFT, signalling Ethereum's new era

project_title: Linea • Scavenger Hunt NFT Launch Strategy & Design
overview: Ahead of the Linea L2 launch, ConsenSys rolled out a scavenger hunt NFT campaign to build awareness and community engagement. I led the end-to-end go-to-market strategy, creative design, and execution of the launch. This included concepting a multi-step interactive hunt, branding the NFT rewards, and developing motion assets and marketing campaigns that guided users through the experience.
contribution: Designed the scavenger hunt narrative and user flow, creating tiered NFT rewards tied to community engagement
Developed campaign branding, NFT graphics, and animation assets for edition drops
Coordinated multi-channel launch strategy—including interactive clues, socials, and platform integration
Worked seamlessly within the ConsenSys infrastructure team to align design, web logic, and launch sequencing
deliverables: Full campaign strategy detailing hunt steps, reward tiers, and UX flows
Branded NFT artwork and animated reveal sequences for each edition
Supporting assets including teaser videos, social posts, and campaign UI prompts
impact: Drove active user participation across the Linea ecosystem through a structured, interactive campaign
Elevated community engagement and anticipation leading into L2 mainnet launch
Demonstrated how layered storytelling and game mechanics can build buzz and brand loyalty around a blockchain rollout

project_title: Bill Nye • Bombay Sapphire Science Series
overview: We led the end-to-end creative execution of the Bill Nye x Bombay Sapphire campaign—a three-part video series where Bill Nye explains the science behind gin and tonics. This campaign supported the brand's RTD cocktail launch and blended educational storytelling with entertainment. It gained attention from outlets like Marketing Dive and Forbes for its smart fusion of science and brand narrative.
contribution: Developed the full creative strategy, scripting, and storyboarding for the series
Directed, produced, shot, and edited all hero videos with Bill Nye
Oversaw post-production including animation, motion graphics, color correction, and pacing
Packaged all deliverables for multi-platform use, including social cutdowns and TV spots
deliverables: Three hero explainer videos (30–60 seconds)
Social-first cutdowns for Instagram, TikTok, and LinkedIn
Broadcast-ready TV spots and accompanying motion graphics
Branded packaging of all creative assets for distribution
impact: Helped position Bombay Sapphire as a forward-thinking, science-inspired brand while driving awareness of its RTD product line
Increased social engagement with content that blended science and entertainment, appealing to millennials and nostalgic Bill Nye fans
Provided a cohesive suite of deliverables adaptable for both digital and traditional media

project_title: Bill Nye • Chipotle "Real Foodprint" Explainer Video
overview: We produced a motion driven explainer video featuring Bill Nye that showcased Chipotle's new "Real Foodprint" sustainability tracker, a tool that surfaces the environmental impact of each order. The video was created for TikTok, Instagram, and their digital platforms, bringing data to life through Bill Nye's engaging, science forward delivery. This campaign combined brand storytelling with environmental transparency and audience activation.
contribution: Crafted the video concept, scripting, and storyboard to highlight five sustainability metrics in an easy to understand format
Directed and produced a full shoot with Bill Nye, overseeing creative setup and on camera performance
Led post production including animation, motion graphics, pacing, and packaging for various formats such as TikTok, Instagram, and in app platforms
deliverables: A 15 to 30 second explainer video featuring Bill Nye
Social optimized cutdowns for TikTok, Instagram, and app integration
Motion overlays and data visual assets based on the Real Foodprint framework
impact: Reinforced Chipotle's commitment to transparency and sustainability through engaging, science led storytelling
Positioned the brand at the intersection of food, data, and purpose while appealing to Gen Z and environmentally conscious audiences
Brought complex environmental data to life through motion design and personality driven narrative

project_title: Casa Blanca • Go to Market Social and Paid Launch
client: Casa Blanca (luxury real estate app for buyers and renters)
overview: Casa Blanca is a luxury real estate app built on swipe style matchmaking and cash back incentives, positioned as a high end alternative to traditional brokerage platforms. We led the go to market launch on social and paid channels, overseeing concept, photography, planning, pre production, production, and final delivery.
contribution: Crafted launch strategy tailored to upscale and savvy homebuyers
Directed concept, produced photo shoots, and planned all pre production
Managed full execution from shoot day through delivery of final assets
deliverables: Hero content and photography for paid launch campaigns
Social first cutdowns and visuals optimized for Instagram, LinkedIn, Facebook
impact: Delivered high quality branded content aligned with Casa Blanca's luxury positioning
Supported early traction in competitive markets by elevating online presence

project_title: The New Yorker – Tote Campaign
overview: For The New Yorker tote campaign, we created a personable and relatable series of ads that outperformed existing creative. Our approach involved storyboarding, directing, shooting, and executing a full content strategy across multiple formats. By refining both the visual storytelling and copy, we drove strong engagement and conversions.
contribution: Led end-to-end creative direction including concepting, copy strategy, and execution
Directed and produced all photography and video assets
Crafted a narrative designed to resonate with audiences on social platforms
deliverables: Static photography and short-form video assets tailored for social platforms
Multiple ad variations including GIFs, walking lifestyle shots, and hero product imagery
Strategy and creative for messaging and copywriting
impact: 4,762 subscriptions from the highest performing variation with a CVR of 3.96%
Average click-through rate (CTR) improvements compared to legacy creative
Strengthened brand relatability by combining lifestyle content with simple, clear value propositions

project_title: Community.com – Community Connects Series
overview: Over an 18-month retainer, we led the full creative strategy, production, and execution for Community.com's flagship content initiative, Community Connects. We created the series concept, developed the name, and built a go-to-market strategy that highlighted how people, vendors, and brands use the platform. We managed every aspect of content production — from storyboarding and shooting to editing, motion design, and packaging deliverables for multi-platform distribution.
contribution: Developed and named Community Connects, defining its tone and purpose
Designed and executed the content strategy for both paid and organic channels
Oversaw pre-production, filming, editing, and animation of all content
Led the brand transition by aligning creative to Community.com's evolving identity
deliverables: Monthly video episodes and social-first static assets for TikTok, Instagram, and LinkedIn
Paid media creatives tailored to maximize engagement and conversion
Brand storytelling packages designed for both awareness and user education
impact: Grew Community.com's social presence by nearly 400% from its seed round baseline
Positioned the brand as a thought leader through strategic storytelling and content marketing
Successfully transitioned the brand identity to resonate with a larger, more diverse audience

project_title: Liquid I.V. – Kids Launch and New Flavors Campaign
overview: We partnered with Liquid I.V. to lead the creative strategy and execution for the launch of Liquid I.V. Kids, along with a social-first campaign introducing new product flavors. Over a 6-week rollout, we developed a content strategy focused on storytelling and product education, producing high-quality visuals designed to engage audiences across TikTok, Instagram, and other digital channels.
contribution: Led all creative concepting and storyboarding to define the campaign's narrative
Oversaw end-to-end production, including pre-production planning, filming, and animation
Directed the visual style and tone to highlight the brand's fun, family-friendly positioning
deliverables: Social-first content packages (video and static) optimized for TikTok and Instagram
Animated product highlights and flavor spotlights
Hero campaign videos for launch announcements and brand storytelling
impact: Delivered a cohesive, multi-platform creative rollout that amplified brand visibility
Helped drive early awareness and excitement for Liquid I.V. Kids and new flavors
Strengthened the brand's social presence with high-performing creative assets

Developed campaign branding, NFT graphics, and animation assets for edition drops

project_title: Betr • Product Design & Social Dynamics
overview: At Betr, I worked across product design, user journey mapping, and onboarding flow optimization while also shaping the social dynamics of the platform. I collaborated closely with the product and engineering teams to ensure that every branded element, from in-app visuals to custom iconography, reflected the brand's identity and performance goals. My role blended UX strategy with visual design to create an intuitive, engaging user experience.
contribution: Designed and refined user journeys, from sign-up to first bet and retention
Built and optimized onboarding flows to reduce friction and improve conversion
Explored and implemented branded app elements, including custom iconography and UI components
Supported the design system and interaction patterns to ensure consistency across features
deliverables: Complete Figma file of app flows, wireframes, and UI designs (to be embedded)
Custom icon sets and branded visual elements
User journey maps and annotated onboarding screens
Collaboration with marketing for in-app moments and dynamic social features
impact: Improved onboarding conversion and user retention with data-backed design iterations
Created a cohesive visual and interaction language across the app
Enhanced the platform's social features to boost engagement

project_title: Potion • Front-End Design for Freelance CRM
overview: Potion is a CRM platform tailored to freelance creatives, helping streamline client outreach, project workflows, and video prospecting through AI-driven personalization. I led the full front-end UX and visual experience—from initial wireframes to final hi-fi designs—shaping the user energy and interaction flows to feel intuitive, polished, and true to their brand identity.
contribution: Designed UX flows, wireframes, and high-fidelity mockups for core features including onboarding, dashboard views, client outreach tools, and video personalization interfaces
Crafted a branded UI kit featuring buttons, cards, modals, and micro‑interactions to reflect Potion's bold, creative positioning
Provided detailed interaction specs and documentation to support a seamless handoff to engineering
deliverables: Full set of UX wireframes and polished screens across key user flows
Branded UI component library and interactive standards
Developer-ready design files with annotations for interactivity and responsive behavior
impact: Created a cohesive front-end design tailored to how freelance creatives work and sell
Captured Potion's creative energy through visual and interactive consistency
Enabled scalable future updates with a structured approach to design and documentation

project_title: Ascend • CRM Platform and Backend Development
overview: Ascend is a platform that allows businesses and individuals to purchase a la carte press placements. We were brought in to design and build the entire backend of their portal, focusing on creating a seamless and intuitive experience for both internal teams and users. This included deep research into user flows, iterative feedback implementation, and designing a system optimized for scalability and ease of management.
contribution: Led backend architecture and UX design for the platform's admin and client dashboards
Conducted user flow research and incorporated feedback loops to refine usability
Designed all interface components and logic for content submission, tracking, and fulfillment
deliverables: Full backend portal design, including user and admin dashboards
Wireframes, user journeys, and interactive prototypes
Scalable backend structure aligned with Ascend's press acquisition model
impact: Streamlined the press placement process with an intuitive, self-service backend
Improved operational efficiency for internal teams managing client campaigns
Delivered a robust, scalable platform that supports future expansion

project_title: Voomio • Multichain NFT Marketplace Design
overview: Voomio is a multichain NFT marketplace designed to simplify NFT discovery and trading across multiple blockchains. We led the entire front-end design journey, bringing structure to new territory during the platform's two-year development cycle. Given the novelty of cross-chain NFT experiences at the time, this was a rigorous, iterative process that combined UX work, brand identity, interaction design, and highly detailed wireframing to shape a future-ready product.
contribution: Led UX flow design, screen wireframes, and high-fidelity UI for multi-curve components (minting, discovery, commerce)
Defined and refined front-end architecture to handle multichain detail without compromising user simplicity
Developed brand identity and UI aesthetics tailored to a novel NFT ecosystem
Continued two-year iteration cycles based on live testing, feedback, and evolving cross-chain functionality
deliverables: Wireframes, flows, and interaction specs for multi-chain NFT experiences
High-fidelity UI libraries aligned with brand system and responsive across devices
Brand identity and typography package suited for web3 positioning
Front-end design files and documentation for developers
impact: Built a scalable front-end framework for an emerging multichain marketplace
Aligned design with blockchain complexity while maintaining clarity and usability
Supported a two-year product roadmap through disciplined iteration and feedback loops
